price: ¡Oh, pueblo mío! ¿Qué sucede que los invito a la salvación y ustedes me invitan al Infierno?
arabic: ۞ وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَا لِيٓ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلنَّجَوٰةِ وَتَدۡعُونَنِيٓ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi mā lī adʿūkum ilā al-najati watadʿūnanī ilā al-nāri
